readme_content:
The Most Comprehensive List of Kaggle Solutions and Ideas

Overview • Usage • Suggestion • Contribution

## Overview This repo consists of almost all available solutions and ideas shared by top performers in the past Kaggle competitions. This list gets updated as soon as a new competition finishes. It allows you to search over the Kaggle past competition solutions and ideas. ## Usage What you only need to do is fork the repo. Then it automatically comes to your Github website to which you can access `https://.github.io/kaggle-solutions`. After that, you would be able to start learning from the past solutions of each competition and take a note in markdown language. ## Suggestion If you want to learn a lot from the past competitions, try carefully read the following for every single competition:
  • Description (Task)
  • Evaluation (Metric)
  • Data
  • Check top performers' profile in Leaderboard
  • Most voted Discussion
  • Most voted Kernels
## Contribution If you found any solution besides the ones listed here, I would suggest you contribute to this repo by making a pull request.
